scenes.background: You suggest reconsidering priorities. [Bob] looks thoughtful.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Reconsidering priorities might be wise, but it could also complicate things. What's your take?'

options.text: It's worth discussing further to ensure we're on the same page.
options.analysis: You show good empathy and self-regulation, but your motivation might be lower as you seek further discussion.

options.text: I think sticking to our initial plan is more efficient.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills, but emotional perception might be lower as you prioritize efficiency.

options.text: Maybe we should split tasks to cover both the report and presentation.
options.analysis: You show high social skills and emotional perception, but empathy could be seen as lacking by not fully considering the complexity.
